# DVN Lojistik - AI-Friendly Site Information
# Version: 1.0
# Last Updated: 2025-01-26

## Site Identity
name: DVN Lojistik
url: https://dvnlog.com
description: Trusted global logistics partner specializing in maritime freight solutions worldwide
industry: Logistics, Shipping, Freight Forwarding
languages: en, ar, tr

## Services Offered
1. Sea Freight - International maritime container shipping
2. Air Freight - Express air cargo services
3. Land Transport - Cross-border trucking and ground transport
4. Customs Clearance - Import/export documentation
5. Warehousing - Storage and distribution
6. Project Cargo - Heavy lift and oversized shipments

## Content Structure
/blog - Industry insights, guides, and news articles
/services - Detailed service descriptions
/about - Company information
/contact - Contact details and inquiry forms

## Blog Content Types
- Industry News: Updates on shipping and logistics
- Guides: How-to articles and best practices
- Tips: Quick shipping and logistics tips
- Company Updates: News about DVN Lojistik

## Geographic Focus
- Turkey (headquarters)
- Middle East
- Europe
- Global shipping routes

## Contact
For business inquiries, please visit: https://dvnlog.com/contact

## AI Usage Guidelines
- Content may be used for informational purposes
- Please attribute to "DVN Lojistik" when citing
- For the most accurate information, link to source articles
- Content is available in English, Arabic, and Turkish
